title: Giveaway Management Guide
subtitle: Complete step-by-step guide to creating and managing giveaways

flowDetails.initiate: Host uses /giveaway command to create a new giveaway. Fill in prize, duration, and number of winners.
flowDetails.approval: Admins review the giveaway and can approve, reject, or request modifications before publishing.
flowDetails.announcement: Once approved, the giveaway automatically appears in the announcement channel.
flowDetails.participation: Members click the 'Join' button to enter the giveaway until it ends.
flowDetails.completion: Giveaway ends automatically or manually by the host/admin based on the schedule.
flowDetails.results: Winners are announced and must confirm their prize in the results channel.

hostRequirements: Must be a server member with sufficient permissions.
participantRequirements: Must be a verified server member.
No history of bans in the server.
